#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

#define si(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define pri(x) printf("%d",x)
#define sll(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define pll(x) printf("%lld",x)
#define sstr(s) scanf("%s",s)
#define pstr(s) printf("%s",s)
#define nl printf("\n")
#define ll long long int
#define mod 1000000007
ll a[101][101];

void power(int n, int p)
{
    if(p==1)
	return;
    ll id[n][n],temp[n][n];
    memset(temp,0,sizeof(temp));
    memset(id,0,sizeof(id));
    for(int i=0;i<n;++i)
	for(int j=0;j<n;++j)
	    if(i==j)
		id[i][j]=1;
    while(p)
    {
	if(p&1)
	{
	    memset(temp,0,sizeof(temp));
	    for(int i=0;i<n;++i)
	    {
		for(int j=0;j<n;++j)
		{
		    for(int k=0;k<n;++k)
		    {
			temp[i][j] = (temp[i][j]+(id[i][k]*a[k][j])%mod)%mod;
		    }
		}
	    }
	    for(int i=0;i<n;++i)
		for(int j=0;j<n;++j)
		    id[i][j]=temp[i][j];
	}
	memset(temp,0,sizeof(temp));
	for(int i=0;i<n;++i)
	{
	    for(int j=0;j<n;++j)
	    {
		for(int k=0;k<n;++k)
		{
		    temp[i][j] = (temp[i][j]+(a[i][k]*a[k][j])%mod)%mod;
		}
	    }
	}
	for(int i=0;i<n;++i)
	    for(int j=0;j<n;++j)
		a[i][j]=temp[i][j];
	p=p>>1;
    }
    for(int i=0;i<n;++i)
	for(int j=0;j<n;++j)
	    a[i][j]=id[i][j];
}

int main()
{
    int t;
    si(t);
    while(t--)
    {
	int e,n;
	si(n); si(e);
	memset(a,0,sizeof(a));
	int x,y;
	for(int i=0;i<e;++i)
	{
	    si(x); si(y);
	    a[x][y]++;
	    a[y][x]++;
	}
	int q,l;
	si(q); si(l);
	power(n,l);
	while(q--)
	{
	    si(x); si(y);
	    pll(a[x][y]%mod); nl;
	}
    }
    return 0;
}
